step_1.chemicals_used: Pyrimidyl alkanol (S)-1 (> 99.5 % ee), ethyl acetate or benzene, racemic 1

solvent_amounts.ethyl_acetate_or_benzene: to make a standardized solution of (S)-1 (3.2 x 10^-6 mol L^-1)
solvent_amounts.racemic_1_solution: 75.1 mg in ethyl acetate or benzene

additional_step.solution_concentration: 9.9 x 10^-3 m solution of (S)-1 with ca. 0.00005 % ee

synthesis_conditions.method: slow diffusion of AgNO3 solution into H2tpyp or Zntpyp solution
synthesis_conditions.notes: Brown crystals of compound 1 formed within a few days. Variable amounts of smaller crystals of compound 2 also formed.

synthesis_conditions.method: slow diffusion of AgNO3 solution into Zntpyp solution
synthesis_conditions.yield: good yield, dark-red crystals formed within a few days
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Can also be obtained in high yields (ca. 97%) as polycrystalline samples by adding AgNO3 in DMA to Zntpyp in TCE/MeOH under stirring in an ice bath.
